channel.description: The latest CVEs for MediaTek, Inc. -- MT6779, MT6781, MT6785, MT6853, MT6853T, MT6873, MT6875, MT6877, MT6879, MT6883, MT6885, MT6889, MT6893, MT6895, MT6983, MT8512A, MT8518, MT8791, MT8797, MT8798

item.description: In audio ipi, there is a possible out of bounds write due to an incorrect bounds check. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS06558799; Issue ID: ALPS06558799.
